line.token: * This file is part of the Symfony package.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* Provides the common logic from writing HttpClientInterface implementations.
* All private methods are static to prevent implementers from creating memory leaks via circular references.
* Validates and normalizes method, URL and options, and merges them with defaults.
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When a not-supported option is found
'Invalid HTTP method "%s", only uppercase letters are accepted.'
'The closure passed as option "buffer" must return bool or stream resource, got "%s".'
'The stream returned by the closure passed as option "buffer" must be writeable, got mode "%s".'
'Option "buffer" must be bool, stream resource or Closure, "%s" given.'
'The stream in option "buffer" must be writeable, mode "%s" given.'
'Define either the "json" or the "body" option, setting both is not supported.'
'Option "auth_basic" must be string or an array, "%s" given.'
'Define either the "auth_basic" or the "auth_bearer" option, setting both is not supported.'
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid option is found
// Option "query" is never inherited from defaults
'try installing the "curl" extension to use "%s" instead.'
'Unsupported option "%s" passed to "%s", did you mean "%s"?'
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid header is found
'Invalid value for header "%s": expected string, "%s" given.'
'Invalid value for header "%s": expected string, "%s" given.'
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid body is passed
'Option "body" must be string, stream resource, iterable or callable, "%s" given.'
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid fingerprint is passed
'Option "peer_fingerprint" must be string or array, "%s" given.'
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When the value cannot be json-encoded
* Resolves a URL against a base URI.
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid URL is passed
'Invalid "base_uri" option: host or scheme is missing in "%s".'
'Invalid URL: scheme is missing in "%s". Did you forget to add "http(s)://"?'
'Invalid URL: no "base_uri" option was provided and host or scheme is missing in "%s".'
* Parses a URL and fixes its encoding if needed.
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid URL is passed
'Unsupported IDN "%s", try enabling the "intl" PHP extension or running "composer require symfony/polyfill-intl-idn".'
* Merges and encodes a query array with a query string.
* @throws InvalidArgumentException When an invalid query-string value is passed
* Loads proxy configuration from the same environment variables as curl when no proxy is explicitly set.
// Ignore HTTP_PROXY except on the CLI to work around httpoxy set of vulnerabilities
